content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><metadata><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin>U.S. Geological Survey</origin><title>Mineral operations outside the United States</title><pubdate>2010</pubdate><geoform>map</geoform><pubinfo><pubplace>Reston, Virginia</pubplace><publish>Geological Survey (U.S.)</publish></pubinfo><othercit>Compilation from five previous publications</othercit><onlink>http://mrdata.usgs.gov/mineral-operations/</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>Mineral facilities and operations outside the United States compiled by the National Minerals Information Center of the USGS. This representation combines source data from five previous publications.</abstract><purpose>National Minerals Information Center makes available a wide variety of commodity statistics and other mineral resource supply and production information both within the United States and internationally.  These databases complement aggregate commodity statistics collected by the NMIC.</purpose></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><rngdates><begdate>2006</begdate><enddate>2010</enddate></rngdates></timeinfo><current>Publication dates of the databases contributing to this compilation</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>As needed</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-178.69</westbc><eastbc>178.39</eastbc><northbc>78.2</northbc><southbc>-54.114</southbc></bounding></spdom><accconst>none</accconst><useconst>none</useconst><keywords><theme><themekt>Alexandria Digital Library Feature Type Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>industrial sites</themekey><themekey>mine sites</themekey><themekey>mineral deposit areas</themekey></theme><theme><themekt>General glossary for mineral resources spatial data</themekt><themekey>comma-delimited text</themekey><themekey>DBF</themekey><themekey>HTML table</themekey><themekey>KML</themekey><themekey>shapefile</themekey><themekey>tab-delimited text</themekey></theme><theme><themekt>USGS Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>business and economics</themekey><themekey>geospatial datasets</themekey><themekey>mineral resources</themekey></theme><theme><themekt>NGDA Portfolio Themes</themekt><themekey>Geology</themekey></theme></keywords><browse><browsen>http://mrdata.usgs.gov/mineral-operations/minfac.png</browsen><browsed>Mineral operation locations, (540 x 270 pixels)</browsed><browset>PNG</browset></browse></idinfo><dataqual><attraccr>Information in these databases comes from industry surveys and literature. While the figures and characteristics are generally judged to be plausible, they may be incorrect in fine detail due to errors in the original sources.</attraccr><logic>Most of these data were compiled by the same small group of authors. Information from the first two reports was published several years before the three most recent reports, so there might be discrepancies among the reports due to the time elapsed between publications.</logic><complete>The following fields contain missing values; the number after the field label is the number of records for which that field is empty.  Other fields are populated for all records. > location      998 > fac_name     1624 > fac_type      141 > dmslat        793 > dmslong       792 > mm           5224 > op_comp       576 > maininvest   4927 > othinvest    6172 > capacity       10 > units         334 > notes        4239</complete><lineage><srcinfo><srccite><citeinfo><origin>Eros, J. 84</ellips><semiaxis>6378137</semiaxis><denflat>298.257</denflat></geodetic></horizsys></spref><eainfo><detailed><enttyp><enttypl>minfac.dbf</enttypl><enttypd></enttypd><enttypds>USGS</enttypds></enttyp><attr><attrlabl>position</attrlabl><attrdef>position. Unique identifying number corresponding to label on map published as Open-File Report 20010-1254. Also used in Notes field as an identifier for other operations when capacities are combined.  Please note that closed facilities are not included in this rep. Integer values. Int of width 4.</attrdef><attrdomv><rdom><rdommin>1</rdommin><rdommax>1727</rdommax><attrunit></attrunit><attrmres>1</attrmres></rdom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>rec_id</attrlabl><attrdef>Record ID. Record identifier without further scientific significance. Integer values. Int of width 4.</attrdef><attrdomv><rdom><rdommin>1</rdommin><rdommax>6620</rdommax><attrunit></attrunit><attrmres>1</attrmres></rdom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>year</attrlabl><attrdef>Currentness year. The year for which the facility capacity and activity status is valid, derived from the Minerals Yearbook. Integer values. Int of width 4.</attrdef><attrdomv><rdom><rdommin>2003</rdommin><rdommax>2008</rdommax><attrunit></attrunit><attrmres>1</attrmres></rdom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>country</attrlabl><attrdef>Country. The country in which the facility is located. Textual values of no more than 24 characters.</attrdef></attr><attr><attrlabl>commodity</attrlabl><attrdef>Commodity. The material mined or processed at the site. Textual values of no more than 64 characters.</attrdef></attr><attr><attrlabl>location</attrlabl><attrdef>Location. Description of the geographical location or vicinity of the facility or operation. Textual values of no more than 168 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 998 records have no value for location.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>fac_name</attrlabl><attrdef>Facility name. Name given to a mine or processing plant that distinguishes it from others owned by the same facility. It may be the name of the facility given to it by the company or by others in the industry, or it may be the name of the nearest city or province, or a. Textual values of no more than 144 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 1624 records have no value for fac_name.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>fac_type</attrlabl><attrdef>Facility type. The type of operation which may be a mine, an oil or gas field, or one of several kinds of processing plants. Textual values of no more than 32 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 141 records have no value for fac_type.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>dmslat</attrlabl><attrdef>Latitude (DMS). Angular distance measured on a meridian north or south from the equator, measured in degrees, minutes, and seconds. Textual values of no more than 12 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 1 records have no value for dmslat.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>dmslong</attrlabl><attrdef>Longitude (DMS). Angular distance between the plane of a meridian east or west from the plane of the meridian of Greenwich, measured in degrees, minutes, and seconds. Textual values of no more than 12 characters.</attrdef></attr><attr><attrlabl>latitude</attrlabl><attrdef>Latitude. Angular distance measured on a meridian north or south from the equator, measured in decimal degrees. Real numbers stored in double precision.</attrdef><attrdomv><rdom><rdommin>-54.114</rdommin><rdommax>78.2</rdommax><attrunit></attrunit></rdom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>longitude</attrlabl><attrdef>Longitude. Angular distance between the plane of a meridian east or west from the plane of the meridian of Greenwich, measured in decimal degrees. Real numbers stored in double precision.</attrdef><attrdomv><rdom><rdommin>-178.69</rdommin><rdommax>178.39</rdommax><attrunit></attrunit></rdom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>precision</attrlabl><attrdef>Location precision. Relative precision of coordinates to an exact facility. Textual values of no more than 4 characters.</attrdef></attr><attr><attrlabl>mm</attrlabl><attrdef>Mining method. The method of mining used by the operation if it is considered to be a mine. Textual values of no more than 4 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 4703 records have no value for mm.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>op_comp</attrlabl><attrdef>Operating company. The principal company operating at the site. Textual values of no more than 254 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 576 records have no value for op_comp.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>maininvest</attrlabl><attrdef>Main investors. The primary shareholders or partners in the operating company or the mineral extraction and (or) processing venture. Textual values of no more than 176 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 4927 records have no value for maininvest.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>othinvest</attrlabl><attrdef>Other investors. The secondary investors and shareholders of the operating company or the mineral extraction and (or) processing venture. Textual values of no more than 254 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 6172 records have no value for othinvest.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>status</attrlabl><attrdef>Operational status. An indicator of whether an operation was producing during the year listed. Closed facilities are not included in this report. Textual values of no more than 20 characters.</attrdef></attr><attr><attrlabl>capacity</attrlabl><attrdef>Operating capacity. The amount of a commodity that is possible to produce at the facility. Textual values of no more than 12 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 10 records have no value for capacity.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>units</attrlabl><attrdef>Capacity units. The unit of measurement for the facility's capacity. Textual values of no more than 44 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 334 records have no value for units.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>notes</attrlabl><attrdef>Notes. Additional information about the record that users should be aware of (mostly refers to combined facility production capacities). Textual values of no more than 128 characters.</attrdef><attrdomv><edom><edomv>(no value)</edomv><edomvd>Information not available for this record. 4239 records have no value for notes.</edomvd></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>cite</attrlabl><attrdef>USGS Report. USGS report in which this record was provided, a numeric value linking to the Mineral Resource Online Data Catalog. Integer values. Int of width 4.</attrdef><attrdomv><rdom><rdommin>847</rdommin><rdommax>851</rdommax><attrunit></attrunit><attrmres>1</attrmres></rdom></attrdomv></attr></detailed></eainfo><distinfo><distrib><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>Peter N Schweitzer</cntper><cntorg>USGS ER GD</cntorg></cntperp><cntpos>Geologist</cntpos><cntaddr><addrtype>mailing address</addrtype><address>12201 Sunrise Valley Drive</address><city>Reston</city><state>VA</state><postal>20192-0002</postal><country>USA</country></cntaddr><cntvoice>703-648-6533</cntvoice><cntfax>703-648-6252</cntfax><cntemail>pschweitzer@usgs.gov</cntemail></cntinfo></distrib><resdesc>Mineral operations outside the US</resdesc><distliab>This report is preliminary and has not been reviewed for conformity with U.S. Geological Survey editorial standards (or with the North American Stratigraphic Code).
